title: Witchaven (1995) - WIN-ALL
description:
Witchaven is a  Build Engine first-person shooter (althrough the combat in the game is mostly of melee variety).
 
The player takes role of the knight Grondoval who seeks to stop the witch Illwhyrin from creating a pernament portal to the demon world.
 
The game was followed by the sequel Witchaven II: Blood Vengeance.

1.Extract anywhere.
2.Press "START THE GAME" batch file.
3.Play.

Compatible with WIN-ALL
